meanings.definition: Resembling cotton in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The clouds looked cottony in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She wore a cottony dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cottony pillow felt like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The cottony snow blanketed the ground in white.
meanings.sent5: The cottony softness of the blanket was comforting.

meanings.definition: Covered in a soft, fluffy material similar to cotton.
meanings.sent1: The cottony kitten purred in her arms.
meanings.sent2: His cottony hair was tousled from sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cottony clouds floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her cottony scarf kept her warm in the winter wind.
meanings.sent5: The cottony texture of the flower petals was delicate.
